Title: Capsule Wardrobe: Dressing Up and Dressing Down

Content.Text: This video showcases how to create versatile outfits using a capsule wardrobe, featuring a dress and a suit as key pieces.
For a casual brunch look, pair the dress with a sweater, military boots, and minimal jewelry.
To dress the dress up for work, add a blazer, statement jewelry, and heels.
For a chic dinner look, remove the jewelry and blazer, and swap the heels for ankle boots.
For a night out with friends, layer the dress with a shirt and skirt, and wear sneakers and a leather jacket.
The suit can be dressed up for formal occasions by adding a tie, pocket square, and dress shoes.
For a more casual look, remove the tie and wear the suit with a button-up shirt and sneakers.
The suit can be broken up into separates, such as pairing the trousers with a sweater and leather jacket for a cool, casual vibe.
The suit jacket can be worn as a sports coat with a t-shirt, jeans, and suede boots for a more relaxed look.
